fields.title: Agreement
fields.content: By using our services you agree to these Terms. If you do not agree, do not use our services.

fields.title: Accounts
fields.content: You are responsible for keeping your account credentials secure. You must provide accurate information and keep it up-to-date. We may suspend accounts that violate these Terms.

fields.title: Payments & Subscriptions
fields.content: Paid features, subscriptions and their pricing are described on the site. By subscribing you authorize recurring charges. Refunds and cancellations follow the policy described on the pricing page.

fields.title: Intellectual Property
fields.content: All content on the site is owned by us or our licensors. You may not copy or redistribute material without permission.

fields.title: Limitation of Liability
fields.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, we are not liable for indirect or consequential losses. Our total liability is limited to the amount you paid in the last 12 months.

fields.title: Governing Law
fields.content: These Terms are governed by the laws of the jurisdiction where FolderFix is established.

fields.title: Changes to Terms
fields.content: We may update these Terms; when we do we will post a revised date. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance.
